alert.note: Alert for Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:15PM EDT until July 24 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Washington County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... West central Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 715 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Phelps Lake, or 15 miles east of Plymouth, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodley, Scuppernong, Phelps Lake and Creswell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
